remarks: If a set of reals contains a lower bound, the lower bound is its infimum.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jun-2013.)
statement:
lbinfm $p |- ( ( S C_ RR /\ E. x e. S A. y e. S x <_ y ) -> sup ( S , RR , `' < ) = ( iota_ x e. S A. y e. S x <_ y ) ) $.
$d S x y $.
